attributes.action: answer questions he is asked and not answer questions he wished he had been asked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has got into a habit of never answering questions he is asked, be it in the House, by journalists, or by anyone. He clearly has a psycological condition that prevents him from answing questions and he needs help urgently.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
